info.description:
Swivel Base
A fun and practical piece - it has a height-adjustable, metal swivel base and castors so you can position yourself as suits you.

Modern Comfort
With a curved back and padded, upholstered seat for additional comfort and support during longer sittings. In walnut and PU leather.

Get the Look
Pair with the Cornell desk for the ultimate study set-up, while the dining chairs make an inspired choice in the kitchen.

Product Details.Base: Chrome metal with gas piston height/swivel function; castors

Product Details.Special features: Height adjustable - gas lever mechanism; swivel seat 360 degrees

info.name: Cornell Swivel Office Chair in walnut and black
